name: CLI Release V2.0.2
description: The beta version of LoginRadius CLI, a brand-new tool that enables you to use the command line interface to accomplish simple LoginRadius Admin Console tasks, is now available. The notable features are as follows:

ADDED.text: Domain Whitelisting/blacklist feature to manage your white/black listed domain for your application.
Theme management feature to update the LoginRadius IDX Page theme for predefined themes available through LoginRadius CLI.
The CLI can be used to control features like App Credentials, Login/Logout choices, SMTP Configuration, and Access Restrictions.
